subject: Technology
title: The Artemis Program: Return to the Moon
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: The Artemis Program: Return to the Moon.

hook.text: No human has walked on the Moon since 1972. NASA's Artemis program aims to change that.

buildup.text: Artemis plans to land the first woman and first person of color on the lunar surface.

discovery.text: Unlike Apollo, Artemis aims to build a permanent base. The Moon would become a stepping stone to Mars.

twist.text: The program has faced massive delays and budget overruns. The timeline keeps shifting further into the future.

climax.text: Despite setbacks, Artemis 1 successfully orbited the Moon in 2022, proving the new rocket works.

punchline.text: We went to the Moon to visit. This time we plan to stay.

quiz.question: What makes Artemis different from the Apollo program?
options: Artemis aims to build a permanent lunar base
Artemis is only for robotic missions
